long_description: The women's SportHill Saga tights are designed for cold-weather training. They feature wind-blocking, stretchy, moisture-wicking fabric to ensure comfort when you're pushing the pace. 4-way stretch polypropylene/spandex fabric offers great wind protection, excellent moisture management and quick dry times to make sure you stay comfortable in the cold. Elastic waistband with drawstring delivers a comfortable fit; mid rise sits about 1 in. below the belly button. Small internal pocket is sized to stow ID, cash or a key. Flatlock seams reduce abrasion, bolster muscle support and ensure a streamlined look and feel. The women's SportHill Saga tights sport elastic grippers at ankles to keep tights in place. Overstock.
short_description: The women's SportHill Saga tights are designed for cold-weather training. They feature wind-blocking, stretchy, moisture-wicking fabric to ensure comfort when you're pushing the pace.
